executable.title: MFSDA_run
executable.description: This provides a commandline interface to run MFSDA.

file.name: shapeData
file.label: Shape List
file.description: Text file list with vtk filenames, 1 file per line

file.name: covariate
file.label: Covariates
file.description: filename, with covariates dim = n x p0, csv file (comma separated or tabulation, without header)

file.name: covariateType
file.label: Covariate types
file.description: filename (csv file), dim=1xsum(covariateInterest) vector comma separated, 1 or 0 to indicate type of covariate double or int
